top_level_symbols.name: make_cache_key
top_level_symbols.doc:
Return a deterministic SHA-256 key for ``payload``. Args:
    payload: Serializable dictionary describing a TTS request.

top_level_symbols.name: cache_path
top_level_symbols.doc:
Return the expected cache path for ``engine``/``voice``/``key``. Args:
    root: Root directory of the cache.
